plot: Andrei is struck by a revelation when he finds himself staring at a pine tree. At the same time, Olga, Mascha and Irina each hide a deadly secret that no human being should ever discover.
title: Shiro
plot_es: Andrei is struck by a revelation when he finds himself staring at a pine tree. At the same time, Olga, Mascha and Irina each hide a deadly secret that no human being should ever discover.
plot_en: Andrei is struck by a revelation when he finds himself staring at a pine tree. At the same time, Olga, Mascha and Irina each hide a deadly secret that no human being should ever discover.
